Package dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.util

Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.util.JsonUtils
public class JsonUtils extends Object
Utility class for parsing JSON objects and extracting fields and custom metadata.

This class provides methods to extract required and optional fields from a JSON object, as well as custom metadata stored in the "customData" section of the JSON.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Map<String,String>
    extractCustomData(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
    Extracts custom metadata from the JSON object, returning key-value pairs from the "customData" section.

  • Method Details

    • extractRequiredField

      public static String extractRequiredField(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject, String fieldName) throws ModuleParsingException
      Extracts a required field from the JSON object. Throws a ModuleParsingException if the field is not found.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The parsed JSON object representing the manifest.
      fieldName - The name of the field to extract.
      Returns:
      The value of the field as a string.
      Throws:
      ModuleParsingException - If the field is missing or empty.

    • extractField

      public static String extractField(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject, String fieldName, String defaultValue)
      Extracts a field from the JSON object and returns a default value if the field is missing.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The parsed JSON object representing the manifest.
      fieldName - The name of the field to extract.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if the field is not found.
      Returns:
      The value of the field or the default value.

    • extractListField

      public static List<String> extractListField(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject, String fieldName)
      Extracts a list of strings from the JSON array associated with the given field.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The parsed JSON object representing the manifest.
      fieldName - The name of the field representing a list.
      Returns:
      A list of strings extracted from the JSON array.

    • extractCustomData

      public static Map<String,String> extractCustomData(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
      Extracts custom metadata from the JSON object, returning key-value pairs from the "customData" section.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The parsed JSON object representing the metadata.
      Returns:
      A map of custom metadata.
